mapper.sql: id, user_code, beforeuf_num, unfreeze_num, afteruf_num, unfreeze_ratio, unfreeze_date, target_system, status, syscode, create_time, modify_time, operator
mapper.select: select count(1) cnt from tb_unfreeze_detail where user_code = #{userCode}

select user_code userCode, beforeuf_num beforeufNum, unfreeze_num unfreezeNum, afteruf_num afterufNum, unfreeze_ratio unfreezeRatio, unfreeze_date unfreezeDate, target_system targetSystem, STATUS STATUS, syscode syscode, create_time createTime, modify_time modifyTime, operator operator from tb_unfreeze_detail where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_unfreeze_detail ( user_code, beforeuf_num, unfreeze_num, afteruf_num, unfreeze_ratio, unfreeze_date, target_system, status, syscode, create_time, modify_time, operator) select a.user_code, sub_acc_no, froze_amnt, froze_amnt*#{unfreezeRatio}, froze_amnt*(1-#{unfreezeRatio}), #{unfreezeRatio}, NOW(), '', '0', syscode, NOW(), NOW(), 'sys' from tb_acc a,tb_user b where a.user_code = b.user_code and a.syscode = #{syscode} and b.user_type=#{userType}
mapper.update: update tb_unfreeze_detail a,tb_user b set a.status = '1', a.modify_time = NOW() where a.status='0' and a.user_code = b.user_code and a.syscode = #{syscode} and b.user_type=#{userType}
